name: Validate Submission, Claim, Account , Customer fields are removed from Unified search dropdown.

testSteps.description: Given underwriter is on home page
When underwriter selects the Unified Search option

Then below fields should not be present under unified search option
| Submission |
| Claim |
| Account |
| Customer |
